i1.name: Love Tap
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Miss Fortune's''' next basic attack against an enemy unit ({{tip|turrets}} included) that was not the target of her previous basic attack, will deal {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|6|key=%|50 to 100|1;4;7 to 13|formula=50%+10% every 3 levels up to 7, then+10% every 2 levels up to 13}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, halved to {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|6|key=%|50/2 to 100/2|1;4;7 to 13|formula=25%+5% every 3 levels up to 7, then+5% every 2 levels up to 13}} AD}} against {{tip|minion|minions}}.
i1.notes:
* With {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}, ''Love Tap'' only applies to the primary target.
* The bonus damage applies {{sti|life steal|link=true}}.

q1.name: Double Up
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Miss Fortune''' fires a shot at the target enemy that deals {{as|physical damage}}, which then bounces to hit another enemy behind it. The shot applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects to both enemies hit, and applies [[on-attack]] effects for the first enemy hit.
''Double Up's'' bounce prioritizes units directly behind the primary target.
''Double Up's'' bounce is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers. If ''Double Up'' kills its primary target, the bounce will critically strike.
''The shot bounces to the enemy regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} can be used by either target. If it is on the primary target, the spell shield will not prevent the shot from bouncing.
* The second shot follows a priority order on targets within 500 units of the primary one:
*# Enemy or neutral units within a 20ยบ cone.
*# Enemy or neutral units within a 40ยบ cone.
*# Enemy or neutral units within a 110ยบ cone.
*# Enemy or neutral units within {{tt|150|Estimated}} units in a 160ยบ cone.
* ''Double Up's'' cast range adjusts based on '''Miss Fortune's''' {{sti|attack range}}, which can be increased by items such as {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}.
* The damage of a {{tip|critical strike|critically striking}} second shot is {{ap|20*2 to 100*2}} {{as|(+ 200% AD)}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}}.
* If there is no secondary target, the shot will not bounce and the dud will instead fall to the ground.
** The dud lands on the ground 176 units behind the primary target and has a missile speed of 400 on its journey there.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 100% AD) (+ 35% AP)

e1.name: Make It Rain
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Miss Fortune''' rains down hundreds of bullets onto the target area for 2 seconds, {{tip|sight|revealing}} it and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within every {{fd|0.25}} seconds and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 10% AP)
  • Maximum Magic Damage: (+ % AP)

  • Slow: %

r1.name: Bullet Time
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Miss Fortune''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for 3 seconds while firing several waves of bullets in a spread of 6 projectiles per wave in the target direction, with each wave dealing {{as|75% AD}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit.
Each wave can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, dealing {{as|{{critical damage|20}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
leveling: {{st|Total Waves|{{ap|12 to 16}}|Minimum Total Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|75*12 to 75*16}}% AD}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20*12 to 20*16}}% AP)}}}} {{st|Wave Interval Time| {{ap|2.85/(12 to 16)|round=4}}}}
r1.notes:
* The damage dealt by each wave of ''Bullet Time'' is calculated when the wave reaches the target.
* Targets cannot be damaged by more than one projectile per wave.
* The bullet streams that each fire 1 projectile per wave are spead by 6{{degree}} between one another, aiming towards the angles +-3/9/15{{degree}} from '''Miss Fortune's''' facing direction.
* ''Bullet time'' picks 6 locations on the ground 500 units from '''Miss Fortune''' (with the aforementioned angles) at the start of the channel and fires a bullet stream towards each.
** If '''Miss Fortune''' is {{ai|Realm Warp|Ryze|teleported}} to a new location, these locations will '''not''' update; the cone will fire towards Miss Fortune's original position, thinning down or spreading out based on distance from the group of locations.
* ''Bullet time'' fires the first wave at {{rutngt|0.05}}, and the last at {{rutngt|2.9}}. Times between waves are equally spread between these values.
** '''Miss Fortune''' may cancel the last ~{{fd|0.1}} seconds of channel time at no loss of effect.
* Waves that {{tip|critically strike}} deal {{as|90% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 24% AP)}}, increased to {{as|{{fd|93.75}} AD}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} with {{ii|Infinity Edge}}.
** If every single wave was a {{tip|critical strike}}, the '''total''' damage would be {{as|{{ap|90*12 to 90*16}}% AD}} {{as|(+ {{ap|24*12 to 24*16}}% AP)}}, increased to {{as|{{ap|93.75*12 to 93.75*16}}% AD}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25*12 to 25*16}}% AP)}} with {{ii|Infinity Edge}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Miss Fortune''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=interrupts|cast=interrupts|move=interrupts|items=interrupts,true,,false|consume=true|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts}}
